1.0.name: wordpress/automatic-plugins
1.0.description:
Inserts WP Page Navi, WP Print and WP Post Ratings Plugins in your theme from the Dashboard. No code necessary! As you know, some plugins need to be installed manually, by editing the theme. Automatic plugins is the easy way to use those plugins without have programming knowledges. This plugin works only with: 1. WP PAGE NAVI 2. WP PRINT 3. WP POST RATINGS

N.B. You must install those plugins before use them with Automatic Plugins.
